text: Pas haqeeqat yeh hai ke tumne unhein qatal nahin kiya balke Allah ne unko qatal kiya, aur tu nay nahin phenka balke Allah ne phenka ( aur mominon ke haath jo is kaam mein istemal kiye gaye) to yeh isliye tha ke Allah momino ko ek behtareen aazmaish se kamiyabi ke saath guzaar de. Yakeenan Allah sunne wala aur janne wala hai
